Package de.oth.blocklib.ai.pathFinding

Class PathPlanner

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.ai.pathFinding.PathPlanner
public class PathPlanner
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
Dennis Schmidt, Edited by Achim Bunke This class implements the extraction of a graph from a blocklib world for calculating a path from a start block to a target block.

      public Graph createGraph​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f startPos, org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f targetPos)
      Parameters:
      startPos - startPoint of the shortest path
      targetPos - targetPoint of the shortest path
      Returns:
      Graph which should be big enough to calculate the shortest Path between the two given coordinates

      Parameters:
      position - The graph will be initialized around the position.
      size - Size in x and z direction
      height - Size in y direction
